topics.body: Well crap. I'm looking into getting a new PC and after reading some things about RAM, I now feel I _need_ ECC or my PC is going to crash from a RAM error. I know ECC is only for servers and everyone else gets by on regular RAM just fine but I'm just the type that after learning that only ONE bit has be wrong (and think of how many BILLIONS go through your RAM every second) I feel it is going to happen one of these days and possibly when I really need it too. Further, it's keeping me from looking into high performance RAM too because the high heat and higher speeds seem to me like it would almost be begging for an error.
